Package objects

Class Action

java.lang.Object
objects.Action
public class Action extends Object

This class define what is an action

Author:
Diana Cantaluppi, Matr. 744457 Sede Como., Edoardo Ballabio, Matr. 745115 Sede Como.

  • Method Details

    • getActionDescription

      public static String getActionDescription(int actionId)
      This method return the description of an action based on its id.
      Parameters:
      actionId - The action's id.
      Returns:
      String the description of the action.

    • possibleActions

      public static int[] possibleActions(int previousAction, boolean login)
      This method returns all possible actions that a user can choose in the state in which it is.
      Parameters:
      previousAction - An integer indicating the user's last action.
      login - A boolean that tracks the user is logged in or not.
      Returns:
      An array of integers that contains all the values â€‹â€‹associate with the actions that the user can choose.
